DOC.brief_title: Trial Vitamin D Supplements Raise Calcidiol Levels Pregnant Women Mongolia
DOC.detailed_description: Vitamin D deficiency ( serum 25 ( OH ) D level < 20 ng/ml 50 nmol/l ) widespread among Mongolians nearly universal winter month . The investigator conduct series study show nearly universal Vitamin D deficiency winter month . Observational study U.S. link low 25 ( OH ) D level woman high risk preeclampsia . Mongolians also report level preeclampsia 3 time high U.S ( official report cite 15 % , though may include gestational hypertension ) . Given widespread Vitamin D deficiency Mongolian woman , high prevalence hypertensive pregnancy Mongolia , observational study link low 25 ( OH ) D level preeclampsia risk , investigator conduct pilot Vitamin D dose trial : - Determine level Vitamin D supplementation need secure 25 ( OH ) D level least 20 ng/ml pregnant Mongolian woman - Generate preliminary data support funding application large trial Vitamin D supplement prevent preeclampsia Mongolia A double-blind randomized , placebo-controlled trial compare impact 600 IU , 2000 IU , 4000 IU Vitamin D3 third trimester 25 ( OH ) D level change baseline . The Vitamin D integrate standard prenatal vitamin , take 12-16 week ' gestation continue throughout pregnancy . Umbilical cord 25 ( OH ) D level also determine . The investigator generate preliminary data regard Vitamin D intake hypertensive disorder , blood pressure , arterial function measure tonography . The investigator independently test blood pressure proteinuria identify preeclampsia case . The investigator enroll 360 woman plan receive prenatal care deliver Zuun Kharaa Hospital Selenge province northern Mongolia . Enrollment stratify season . 120 woman randomize three dos vitamin D ( 600 , 2000 , 4000 IU ) include standard prenatal vitamin . Calcemia monitor two month randomization week 36-40 pregnancy . Adverse event pregnancy report DSMB IRBs per protocol . Data gather Mongolian study coordinator local clinician . A DSMB comprise U.S. Mongolian clinician statistician monitor study data safety .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 old 1216 week pregnant Receiving prenatal care Zuun Kharaa Hospital planning deliver Zuun Kharaa Hospital Willing take additional vitamin D supplement , study dispense pill Existing know seizure disorder , renal failure , parathyroid disease , thyroid disease , sarcoidosis , cancer , tuberculosis . ( Tuberculosis routinely screen pregnancy ) History kidney stone Known sensitivity multivitamin preparation Taking vitamin D supplement contain > 600 IU/day .
